data.text:
"And now, we would like to ask Her Royal Highness Fine Motion 
for her comments."
data.name: Broadcast
data.processed:
<story>"And now, we would like to ask Her Royal Highness Fine Motion 
<story>for her comments."

data.text: ......Your Highness?
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed: <story>......Your Highness?

data.text:
Your Highness. 
Your comments?
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Your Highness. 
<story>Your comments?

data.text:
... 
Yes, if you would allow me...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>... 
<story>Yes, if you would allow me...

data.text:
I would like to make an announcement. 
I, Fine Motion, as I vowed――
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I would like to make an announcement. 
<story>I, Fine Motion, as I vowed――

data.text:
...will return to my motherland in one year's time. 
There is much to confirm prior to my departure――
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>...will return to my motherland in one year's time. 
<story>There is much to confirm prior to my departure――

data.text:
With the coming of the new year, there was a lot of work for 
Fine Motion to do.
data.processed:
<story>With the coming of the new year, there was a lot of work for 
<story>Fine Motion to do.

data.text:
She had yet another meeting with the Irish officials today, 
so I was sitting around waiting for it to end...
data.processed:
<story>She had yet another meeting with the Irish officials today, 
<story>so I was sitting around waiting for it to end...

data.text: ――Sorry for the wait, Trainer!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>――Sorry for the wait, Trainer!

data.text:
A lot of the people there were pretty casual about things, so 
we just kept tacking things onto the agenda~
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: Well, let's get to training then.
Well, let's get to training then.

data.processed:
<story>A lot of the people there were pretty casual about things, so 
<story>we just kept tacking things onto the agenda~

data.text:
...Mmm, can we put it on hold for a bit? 
I need to get a drink.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>...Mmm, can we put it on hold for a bit? 
<story>I need to get a drink.

data.text:
Before, she'd jump at the chance to go running again. 
But lately it felt like she was always looking over her shoulder.
data.processed:
<story>Before, she'd jump at the chance to go running again. 
<story>But lately it felt like she was always looking over her shoulder.

data.text:
Trainer. 
...Could you go to Her Highness?
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Trainer. 
<story>...Could you go to Her Highness?

data.text:
None have the right to meddle in the affairs of Her Highness's 
heart but herself. But you―― You may have the right to ask.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>None have the right to meddle in the affairs of Her Highness's 
<story>heart but herself. But you―― You may have the right to ask.

data.text:
――Even after all that, you're still the same. 
Your running... and your stupid, unchanging face.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>――Even after all that, you're still the same. 
<story>Your running... and your stupid, unchanging face.

data.text:
When I went to get her, she was already talking to Air Shakur. 
I didn't want to interrupt, so I started to turn around――
data.processed:
<story>When I went to get her, she was already talking to Air Shakur. 
<story>I didn't want to interrupt, so I started to turn around――

data.text:
Can't you just act the way you always do? 
Doing whatever you want like the big brat you are.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Can't you just act the way you always do? 
<story>Doing whatever you want like the big brat you are.

data.text:
"I want to run more." ―― 
Isn't that all the rationale you need?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>"I want to run more." ―― 
<story>Isn't that all the rationale you need?

data.text:
...I don't think that way at all. 
I've already been allowed to run more than my fair share.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>...I don't think that way at all. 
<story>I've already been allowed to run more than my fair share.

data.text:
The hell's going on with you? You're not dumb enough to 
half-ass a lie like that.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>The hell's going on with you? You're not dumb enough to 
<story>half-ass a lie like that.

data.text:
You already know, don't you? 
That there's one thing I put above all else...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>You already know, don't you? 
<story>That there's one thing I put above all else...

data.text:
I want to fulfill my duty, from the bottom of my heart. 
I'm not doing something as romantic as throwing myself on the 
cross.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I want to fulfill my duty, from the bottom of my heart. 
<story>I'm not doing something as romantic as throwing myself on the 
<story>cross.

data.text:
...There's that royal upbringing. 
Still in the headspace to get philosophical, huh.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...There's that royal upbringing. 
<story>Still in the headspace to get philosophical, huh.

data.text:
You might've tried to cope with it all in your head, but 
I know you haven't figured a damn thing out. 
Still in denial about it, ain't you?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You might've tried to cope with it all in your head, but 
<story>I know you haven't figured a damn thing out. 
<story>Still in denial about it, ain't you?

data.text: It hit you at the Liz Cup. Just how fun racing was.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>It hit you at the Liz Cup. Just how fun racing was.

data.text: I know what you were thinking. ――Screw my duty. I want to run like this, forever... Right?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: I know what you were thinking. ――Screw my duty. I want to run like this, forever... Right?

data.text: ...Shakur... please stop?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>...Shakur... please stop?

data.text:
You had to rationalize that thought out of your head. 
So you made yourself believe you didn't want to run anymore.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You had to rationalize that thought out of your head. 
<story>So you made yourself believe you didn't want to run anymore.

data.text:
You won't focus, you won't keep going. 
...Even though you damn well can!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You won't focus, you won't keep going. 
<story>...Even though you damn well can!

data.text: Shakur...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Shakur...

data.text:
You tell your trainer about this? 
Bet you haven't.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You tell your trainer about this? 
<story>Bet you haven't.

data.text:
That poor S.O.B.'s been ready for this ever since they first roped 
me into running with you.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>That poor S.O.B.'s been ready for this ever since they first roped 
<story>me into running with you.

data.text:
Even if you really do have to quit. 
If there's no point pushing you forward, what's your trainer even 
there for?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Even if you really do have to quit. 
<story>If there's no point pushing you forward, what's your trainer even 
<story>there for?

data.text:
... 
You may be right.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>... 
<story>You may be right.

data.text:
It might be the right thing to let them know. 
That I won't be able to accept their help for much longer.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>It might be the right thing to let them know. 
<story>That I won't be able to accept their help for much longer.

data.text: Then why don't――
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Then why don't――

data.text:
But listen, Shakur. 
I can't put any more weight on their shoulders.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>But listen, Shakur. 
<story>I can't put any more weight on their shoulders.

data.text: My Trainer's already taken on so many responsibilities for me.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>My Trainer's already taken on so many responsibilities for me.

data.text:
I don't want to take advantage of their determination. 
And...
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I don't want to take advantage of their determination. 
<story>And...

data.text:
This is something I have to shoulder alone. 
...For my future.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>This is something I have to shoulder alone. 
<story>...For my future.

data.text: Tch... Just how noble do you think you are?!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Tch... Just how noble do you think you are?!

data.text:
Shakur, wait...! 
Thank you for thinking about me!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Shakur, wait...! 
<story>Thank you for thinking about me!

data.text:
...Don't talk as if I'm like you. 
I'm not thinking of anyone but myself.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Don't talk as if I'm like you. 
<story>I'm not thinking of anyone but myself.

data.text: I just... It's just a what if. If you managed to overcome the data, something might change――
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: I just... It's just a what if. If you managed to overcome the data, something might change――

data.text: ...That's all.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...That's all.

data.text:
...I don't know anything about data. 
But I think we're not so different.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>...I don't know anything about data. 
<story>But I think we're not so different.

data.text:
I knew from the moment we met. 
That there would come a time that you would need me.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I knew from the moment we met. 
<story>That there would come a time that you would need me.

data.text: ――That I would need to be at your side.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>――That I would need to be at your side.

data.text:
......! 
You're so goddamn arrogant...!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>......! 
<story>You're so goddamn arrogant...!

data.text:
Hehe, I guess I am. 
I'm super arrogant and super stubborn.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, I guess I am. 
<story>I'm super arrogant and super stubborn.

data.text:
...But if that's the case, then... Just. 
What if. 
If I asked... would you keep running?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...But if that's the case, then... Just. 
<story>What if. 
<story>If I asked... would you keep running?

data.text:
If I needed you to keep running... 
Would you be a god for me?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>If I needed you to keep running... 
<story>Would you be a god for me?

data.text:
......gh. 
......Forget it!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>......gh. 
<story>......Forget it!

data.text:
I'm sorry, Shakur. 
I love my destiny.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry, Shakur. 
<story>I love my destiny.

data.text: ......I have to love it.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>......I have to love it.

data.text:
For now, she'll stand alone. 
But when the time comes and she needs help―― 
That's when I need to fulfill our first promise.
data.processed:
<story>For now, she'll stand alone. 
<story>But when the time comes and she needs help―― 
<story>That's when I need to fulfill our first promise.
